mn108:11.1: garuṃ karotha → garukarotha (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) VAR: garuṃ katvā → garukatvā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn108:15.2: dhātā → dhatā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), sātthaṃ, sabyañjanaṃ → sātthā sabyañjanā (bj, s1-3, km)
mn108:18.1: tirokuṭṭaṃ → tirokuḍḍaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), parimasati → parāmasati (mr)
mn108:24.2: maññati bhavaṃ senāpati → maññasi bhavaṃ senāpati (bj, mr) | maññasi evaṃ senāpati (s1-3, km, pts1)
